title: 新英雄的W技能机制有问题啊
body: {{champion:518}} 的W技能会自己绕过墙体直到到达目的地或者到达持续时间，当W技能在大小龙坑释放的时候，不管怎样都会向着出口跑出去，这样如果我想隐身之后把分身留在里面自己跑出去就做不到了。而且经常会出现被卡在墙边不动的情况。我觉得至少在龙坑里面不应该向外跑或者可以自己控制分身跑出去的距离。

replies.body:
Google Translate:

There is a problem with the new hero's W skill mechanism.

The W skill will bypass the wall by itself until it reaches the destination or reaches the duration. When the W skill is released in the big dragon pit, it will run out to the exit anyway, so if I want to hide, leave the split inside and run. Going out can't do it. And often there is a situation where the card is stuck on the wall. I feel that at least in the dragon pit, you should not run out or you can control the distance that you run out.
